actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to conduct a study of the use of intermodal containers on the Nation's highways and of violations of Federal and State highway weight laws through the use of intermodal containers on the Nation's highways, and for other purposes.
short_title: Safe Intermodal Container Transportation Act of 1990

summary.text: Safe Intermodal Container Transportation Act of 1990 - Directs the Secretary of Transportation to investigate the use of intermodal containers in providing commercial motor vehicle transportation and of violations of Federal and State highway weight laws by such use. Requires the Secretary to have random weight checks conducted at selected highway locations. Requires the Secretary to report to specified congressional committees the results of such investigation, together with recommendations addressing the problems associated with the use of overweight intermodal containers.

titles.title: Safe Intermodal Container Transportation Act of 1990

To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to conduct a study of the use of intermodal containers on the Nation's highways and of violations of Federal and State highway weight laws through the use of intermodal containers on the Nation's highways, and for other purposes.
